messages.got_message_session: Got another message! I've saved it to your session.

help.user:
📚 Available Commands:

/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help
/ask - Ask AI a question
/batch - Batch processing demo
help.owner:
👑 Owner Commands:
/info - Bot information
/admin - Manage admins
/debug - Toggle debug mode

info.error: ❌ Failed to retrieve bot information. Check logs for details.

admin.removed: ✅ User {{userId}} is no longer an admin
admin.add_error: ❌ Failed to add administrator. Please try again.
admin.remove_error: ❌ Failed to remove administrator. Please try again.
admin.list_error: ❌ Failed to retrieve admin list. Please try again.
admin.granted_notification: 🎉 You have been granted administrator privileges in this bot!
admin.revoked_notification: ℹ️ Your administrator privileges have been revoked.

debug.usage: 🐛 Debug Mode Management Available commands: /debug on [level] - Enable debug mode /debug off - Disable debug mode /debug status - Show current status Debug levels: 1 - Only owners see debug messages 2 - Owners and admins see debug messages 3 - Everyone sees debug messages Debug mode shows error messages and access attempts that are normally hidden.
debug.invalid_level: ❌ Invalid debug level. Please use 1, 2, or 3.
debug.enable_error: ❌ Failed to enable debug mode. Please try again.
debug.disable_error: ❌ Failed to disable debug mode. Please try again.
debug.status_error: ❌ Failed to retrieve debug status. Please try again.
debug.status_disabled: Disabled Debug messages are hidden for all users.

requests.error: ❌ Failed to retrieve access requests. Please try again.

batch.info: ⚡ Request batching is automatically enabled! The bot optimizes Telegram API calls by: • Batching multiple requests together • Reducing API overhead • Improving response times This happens transparently in the background.

gemini.prompt_needed: Please provide a prompt after the command, e.g., /askgemini What is the capital of France?
gemini.error: Sorry, I could not generate a response at this time.
gemini.not_available: AI features are not available in free tier mode.

general.not_configured:
🚫 AI service is not configured.

Please contact the bot administrator.
general.not_available_free_tier:
🚫 AI features are not available in the free tier.

Upgrade to the paid tier to access:
• AI-powered responses
• Advanced text generation
• Smart assistance
general.prompt_needed:
💭 Please provide a question or prompt after the command.

Example: /ask What is the weather like today?
general.error:
❌ Sorry, I encountered an error while processing your request.
Please try again later.
